General.Name: HILLGROVE RESOURCES
General.Description: Hillgrove Resources Limited operates as a mining company in Australia. The company explores for copper, gold, and silver deposits. The company's flagship project is Kanmantoo Copper mine located approximately 55km from Adelaide, South Australia. Hillgrove Resources Limited was incorporated in 1952 and is headquartered in Unley, Australia.
General.Address: 5-7 King William Road, Unley, SA, Australia, 5061

1.Name: Mr. Peter James Rolley MAIG, MSc (Geology)
